413910.name: Robotpencil Presents: Character Design - Horror Genre
413910.description:
This will cover the various things you can do to achieve creepy, and scary concepts that can be used for Horror games.

Video 1

Concept thumbs, along with sketching

Video 2

Painting a monster portrait, techniques,and brush work

Video 3

Coloring a monster portrait, strategy and clever layer usage

Video 4

Painting from scratch using texture brushes.

Video 5

Coloring and finalizing a monster design.
413910.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 原生支持 Steam 控制器
